text: John Niemiec (March 21, 1901 – June 16, 1976) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Columbia College—now known as Loras College—in Dubuque, Iowa from 1934 to 1937. Niemiec played college football at the University of Notre Dame from 1926 to 1928. He led the Fighting Irish in passing in 1927 and 1928. Niemiec also coached at Steubenville High School in Steubenville, Ohio and Bellaire High School in his home town of Bellaire, Ohio. He died on June 16, 1976, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1976 deaths Category:American football halfbacks Category:Loras Duhawks football coaches Category:Notre Dame Fighting Irish football players Category:High school football coaches in Ohio Category:People from Bellaire, Ohio Category:Players of American football from Ohio
title: John Niemiec
